mapper.select: select r.reply_id as reply_id, m.member_id as member_id, r.content_id as content_id, m.member_name as member_name, r.reply_regdt as reply_regdt,r.reply_content as reply_content, r.reply_isDeleted as reply_idDeleted from member as m, attraction_reply as r where m.member_id = r.member_id and r.content_id = #{contentId} order by r.reply_regdt desc limit #{limit};
select count(*) from attraction_reply where content_id = #{contentId}
